params._nonce: A number to guarantee unique depositId. Can be timestamp in practice.
params._toAccount: The account to receive tokens on the remote chain
params._toChainId: If zero, withdraw from BTC chain; otherwise, the remote chain to mint tokens.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: The bridge contract to mint and burn pegged brc20 tokens

burn(address,uint256,uint64,bytes,uint64.notice: Burn pegged tokens to trigger a cross-chain withdrawal of the original tokens on the BTC chain. NOTE: This function DOES NOT SUPPORT fee-on-transfer / rebasing tokens.

mint(address,address,uint256,bytes,uint6.notice: Mint tokens triggered by deposit on BTC chain
